name: Sweepa

aura.name: king_of_fluff
aura.description: While fighting together, stats will increase the more Swee are in your team.

description:
While hibernating, a large number of Swee hide within its voluminous body hair.
The most ever recorded is 101.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: ice_missile
skills.description: Creates ice lances in the air that fly towards enemies.

skills.name: icicle_cutter
skills.description: Creates a crescent blade of ice and hurls it forward.

skills.name: iceberg
skills.description: Summons a sharp ice lance under an enemy.

skills.name: cryst_breath
skills.description: Enshrouds an enemy in a frigid blast of air, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.

skills.name: blizzard_spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.
